descriptor: Large pothole on Main St causing cars to swerve.
Manhole cover missing; risk of accident near school.
Streetlight out on 5th Ave; area is dark and feels unsafe.
Traffic light not working at junction; accidents may happen.
Water main leak flooding the road in front of building.
No water supply in apartment since morning; taps not working.
Sewage overflowing from manhole; strong odor and overflow on sidewalk.
Drain clogged and rainwater is stagnant; mosquitoes increasing.
Garbage not collected for a week; bins overflowing.
Public toilet dirty and not cleaned regularly.
Power outage in Sector 12 since last night.
Voltage fluctuations damaging appliances; frequent power cuts.
Fallen electric pole with sparks; very dangerous situation.
Loud construction noise late night; disturbance in area.
Sidewalk is broken with cracks and uneven surface.
Drainage channel blocked with plastic waste near market.
Vehicles blocking fire hydrant; safety hazard.
Abandoned vehicle on street; attracts suspicious activity.
Road construction delayed for months; traffic congestion daily.
Overflowing garbage bin attracts stray animals.
